61 MOFSModel::~MOFSModel() {
62 
63  while (fuzzy_input_vars != 0) {
64  VarsNode *aux_vars = fuzzy_input_vars;
65  fuzzy_input_vars = aux_vars->next;
66  delete aux_vars;
67  }
68 
69 
70  while (rule_store != 0) {
71  RuleNode *aux_rules = rule_store;
72  rule_store = aux_rules->next;
73  delete aux_rules;
74  }
75 }

77 void MOFSModel::open1(int _mode) {
78  fuzzy_input_vars = 0;
79  fuzzy_output_vars = 0;
80  rule_data_list = 0;
81  rule_store = 0;
82  num_vars = 0;
83  num_inputs = 0;
84  mode = _mode;
85  defuzz_method = new MOFSMCDefuzz();
86 /* ofstream pesos("pesos1.txt");
87  ofstream error_out("error1.txt");
88  ofstream vars_out("vars_out1.txt");
89  if (!pesos) cout << "error creando el fichero de pesos!";
90  if (!error_out) cout << "error creando el fichero de error!";
91  if (!vars_out) cout << "error creando el fichero de vars_out!";*/
92  loadVars();
93  genRulebase();
94 }

97 void MOFSModel::open2(char *fileVars, char *fileRules, int _mode, int genRules, int option4CreateVars) {
98  FILE* file_inVars;
99  file_inVars = fopen(fileVars,"r");
100  if (!file_inVars) {
101  fprintf(stderr,"[!]Error abriendo el fichero de datos!\n");
102  }else {
103  fuzzy_input_vars = 0;
104  fuzzy_output_vars = 0;
105  rule_data_list = 0;
106  rule_store = 0;
107  num_vars = 0;
108  num_inputs = 0;
109  mode = _mode;//mode = 0 --> manual training. ask to the user if the output is correct or not
110  //mode = 1 --> learning proccess active
111  //mode = 2 --> normal process
112  defuzz_method = new MOFSMCDefuzz();
113  readVars(file_inVars, option4CreateVars);
114 
115  // showVars();
116  //
117  if (genRules==1){
118  genRulebase();
119  }else{
120  FILE* file_inRules;
121  file_inRules = fopen(fileRules,"r");
122  if (!file_inRules) {
123  cout << "error abriendo el fichero de datos!";
124  }else {
125  readRulebase(file_inRules);
126  }
127  }
128  fclose(file_inVars);
129  error_out = fopen("errorPrueba.txt","a+");
130 
131  }
132 }

146 void MOFSModel::readData(float &max_x, float &min_x, int &crisp) {
147  //float num[2];
148  cout << "insert the max value of x" << endl;
149  cin >> max_x;
150  cout << "insert the min value of y" << endl;
151  cin >> min_x;
152  cout << "insert the crisp value (differents values for the variable)" << endl;
153  cin >> crisp;
154  cout << "crisp: " << crisp << endl;
155 }

158 
159 void MOFSModel::insertVar(VarsNode* new_var, char option) {
160  if (option == 'I') {
161  if (fuzzy_input_vars == 0) {
162  // primera variable
163  fuzzy_input_vars = new_var;
164  } else {
165  // inserta la variable por detras
166  VarsNode* aux_inputs = fuzzy_input_vars;
167  while (aux_inputs->next != 0) {
168  aux_inputs = aux_inputs->next;
169  }
170  aux_inputs->next = new_var;
171  }
172  }else{
173  //output var
174  if (fuzzy_output_vars == 0) {
175  fuzzy_output_vars = new_var;
176  } else {
177  VarsNode* aux_output = fuzzy_output_vars;
178  while (aux_output->next != 0) {
179  aux_output = aux_output->next;
180  }
181  aux_output->next = new_var;
182  }
183  }
184 }
185 
196 int MOFSModel::loadVars() {
197 
198 
199  float max_x, min_x;
200  int crisp;
201  char name[20];
202  //char basura;
203  char option;
204 
205  while (1) {
206 
207  fflush(stdin);
208  VarsNode* new_var = new VarsNode;
209  cout << "Insert the name of the variable: ";
210  cin.getline(name,20);
211  cout << name << endl;
212  if (cin.gcount() <= 1) {
213  cout << "no more vars";
214  return 1; // no more variables
215  }
216  do {
217  cout << "Insert I or O for Input/Output variable: ";
218  cin >> option;
219  }while ((option != 'I') && (option != 'O'));
220  readData(max_x, min_x, crisp);
221  new_var->var = new MOFSVar(name,max_x, min_x, crisp);
222  new_var->next = 0;
223  new_var->values = 0;
224  insertVar(new_var, option);
225  if (option == 'I') {
226  num_inputs++;
227  }
228  cin.get();
229  fflush(stdin);
230  }
231 }
232 
233 
234 //int MOFSModel::readVars(FILE* file_in, int option4CreateVars) {
235 int MOFSModel::readVars(FILE* file_in, int option4CreateVars) {
236  char var_option;
237  fscanf(file_in,"%d",&num_vars);
238  printf("numvars:%d\n",num_vars);
239  // fscanf(file_in,"%s",&var_option);
240  for (int i = num_vars; i>0; i--) {
241  VarsNode* new_var;
242  new_var = new VarsNode;
243 
244 
245  fscanf(file_in,"%s",&var_option);
246  printf("\nvar_option: %c\n",var_option);
247 // new_var->var = new MOFSVar(file_in, option4CreateVars);
248  new_var->var = new MOFSVar(file_in, option4CreateVars);
249  new_var->next = 0;
250  new_var->values = 0;
251 
252  insertVar(new_var,var_option);
253  if (var_option == 'I') {
254  num_inputs++;
255  }
256  }
257 
258  cout << "num_inputs: " << num_inputs << endl;
259 // cin.get();
260  return 1;
261 }
262 
274 void MOFSModel::genRule(char inputs_[], VarsNode* aux, int cont_vars){
275  if (cont_vars>=num_inputs){ //caso base
276  aux = fuzzy_output_vars;
277  char max_index= aux->var->setIndex();
278  int outputRandom = rand()%(max_index-65);
279  RuleNode* new_rule = new RuleNode;
280  new_rule->rule = new MOFSRule(num_inputs,inputs_, ((char)outputRandom+65));
281  new_rule->next = rule_store;
282  rule_store = new_rule;
283  int tam=10;
284  char itp[num_inputs];
285  // printf("cont_var:%d, tamaño inputs:%d, tamañonitp=%d\n",cont_vars, sizeof(inputs_),sizeof(itp));
286  //printf("inputs: %c,%c,%c,%c,%c\n",inputs[0],inputs[1],inputs[2],inputs[3],inputs[4]);
287  }else{
288  char max_index= aux->var->setIndex();
289  for (char i='A';i<max_index;i++) {
290  inputs_[cont_vars]=i;
291 ;
292  VarsNode* aux_ = fuzzy_input_vars;
293  aux_ = aux->next;
294  genRule(inputs_, aux_, cont_vars+1);
295  }
296  }
297 }

312 int MOFSModel::genRulebase() {
313  srand(time(0));
314  VarsNode* aux = fuzzy_input_vars;
315  char max_index= aux->var->setIndex();
316  char inputs_[num_inputs];
317  // printf("numero de entradas= %d, %d\n",num_inputs,sizeof(inputs_));
318  int cont_vars=0;
319  genRule(inputs_, aux, cont_vars);
320  // printf("numero de entradas= %d, %d\n",num_inputs,sizeof(inputs_));
321  return 1;
322 
323 }

327 int MOFSModel::readRulebase(FILE* file_in)
328 {
329  if (!file_in) {
330  cout << "error al leer del fichero";
331  cin.get();
332  return 1;
333  }
334  char *inputs = new char[num_inputs];
335  // printf("num_inputsReadRuleBase: %d ", num_inputs);
336  char output;
337  float weight;
338 
339  while (!feof(file_in)) {
340  RuleNode* new_rule = new RuleNode;
341  fscanf(file_in,"%s",inputs);
342  // printf("inputs: %s", inputs);
343  fscanf(file_in,"%c",&output);fscanf(file_in,"%c",&output);
344  fscanf(file_in,"%f",&weight);
345  new_rule->rule = new MOFSRule(num_inputs,inputs,output,weight);
346  new_rule->next = rule_store;
347  rule_store = new_rule;
348  }
349  return 1;
350 }
351 
352 int MOFSModel::learning(char* file) {
353  FILE* file_learning;
354  file_learning = fopen(file,"r");
355  if (!file_learning) { cout << "error abriendo el fichero de datos!";return -1;
356  }else {
357  int __num_inputs;
358  float _output;
359  float* output;
360  float* ipts;
361 
362  fscanf(file_learning,"%d",&__num_inputs);
363  if (__num_inputs!=num_inputs){
364  printf("ERROR!!!");
365  }
366  ipts = new float[num_inputs];
367  while (!feof(file_learning)) {
368  for (int i=0;i<num_inputs;i++) {
369  fscanf(file_learning,"%f",&ipts[i]);
370  }
371  fscanf(file_learning,"%f",&_output);
372  output = &_output;
373  inputIrq(ipts,output);
374 
375  }
376  delete(ipts);
377  }
378  fclose(file_learning);
379  return 1;
380 }
381 
395 float MOFSModel::inputIrq(float inputs[],float* _output) {
396 
397  rule_data_list = 0; // resetea la lista de reglas obtenidas con las entradas de la vez anterior
398  //printf("MOFS.inputs: %f, %f, %f :: %f\n",inputs[0],inputs[1],inputs[2], _output);
399  // ahora calculamos todos los posibles valores fuzzy y resultados float para
400  // las entradas dadas ---> crear lista de cromosomas v�lidos
401 
402  VarsNode* aux = fuzzy_input_vars; // auxiliar para recorrer la lista de entradas
403  int counter = 0; // variable para recorrer el array de entradas
404  while (counter < num_inputs) {
405  // numero de variables de entrada en el sistema
406  aux->var->calc_values(inputs[counter]);
407  aux = aux->next;
408  counter ++;
409  }
410  aux = fuzzy_input_vars;
411  getValidRules();
412  return Action(_output);
413 
414 }
415 
416 
429 void MOFSModel::getValidRules() { // obtiene el array de reglas v�lidas para las entradas dadas.
430 
431  RuleNode* aux_rule = rule_store; // Variable para recorrer la base de reglas
432 
433 
434 // char* rule_sets;
435  char *ipts;
436  ipts = new char[num_inputs];
437  while (aux_rule != 0) {
438  // toma los valores de los conjuntos de esa regla
439 // char *ipts;
440 // ipts = new char[num_inputs];
441  aux_rule->rule->inputs_array(ipts);
442  char rule_output = aux_rule->rule->outputValue();
443 
444  VarsNode* aux_vars = fuzzy_input_vars; // Variable para recorrer las entradas
445  int counter = 0;
446  bool ok = true;
447 
448  while (ok && (aux_vars != 0)) {
449  if (aux_vars->var->correctValue(ipts[counter])) {
450  // chequea cada variable de la regla si coincide con las entradas pasadas
451  aux_vars = aux_vars->next;
452  counter++;
453  }else {
454  ok = false;
455  }
456  }
457 
458  if (ok==true) {
459  // si coinciden todos los valores de las variables, se guarda el cromosoma de dicha regla
460  saveRule(ipts,rule_output,aux_rule->rule->Weight());
461  }
462  aux_rule = aux_rule->next;
463  }
464  delete(ipts);
465 }
466 
467 
468 void MOFSModel::insertRuleVar(RuleValues* &r_values,RuleValues* rv) {
469 
470  if (r_values == 0) {
471  // primera variable
472  r_values = rv;
473  } else {
474  // inserta la variable por detras
475  RuleValues* aux_rule_values = r_values;
476  while (aux_rule_values->next != 0) {
477  aux_rule_values = aux_rule_values->next;
478  }
479  aux_rule_values->next = rv;
480  }
481 }

483 void MOFSModel::showRules() {
484  RuleNode *aux_rules = rule_store;
485  char *ipts;
486  ipts = new char[num_inputs];
487  cout << "numero de inputs= " << num_inputs << endl;
488  while (aux_rules != 0) {
489  aux_rules->rule->inputs_array(ipts);
490  cout << "inputs: ";
491 // for (int i =0;i<num_inputs;i++) {
492 // cout << ipts[i] << " ";
493 // }
494  // printf("inputs: %c,%c,%c,%c,%c\n",ipts[0],ipts[1],ipts[2],ipts[3],ipts[4]);
495  cout << " output: " << aux_rules->rule->outputValue() << " weight: " << aux_rules->rule->Weight() <<endl;
496  aux_rules = aux_rules->next;
497  }
498 }
499 
512 void MOFSModel::saveRule(char ipts[],char rule_output, float _weight) {
513 // MOFSRule::Set* rule_sets = static_cast<MOFSRule::Set*> (ruleSets);
514  RuleData* rule_data = new RuleData;
515  VarsNode* aux_vars = fuzzy_input_vars; // Variable para recorrer las entradas
516 
517 // cout << "Regla valida: ";
518  rule_data->inputs_sets = new char[num_inputs];
519  rule_data->inputs_values = new float[num_inputs];
520  for (int i=0; i<num_inputs;i++) {
521  rule_data->inputs_sets[i] = ipts[i];
522  rule_data->inputs_values[i] = aux_vars->var->yValue(ipts[i]);
523 // cout << rule_data->inputs_sets[i] << " " << rule_data->inputs_values[i] << " ; ";
524  aux_vars = aux_vars->next;
525  }
526  rule_data->weight = _weight;
527  rule_data->rule_set_output = rule_output; // Store the output
528  rule_data->rule_output = fuzzy_output_vars->var->center(rule_output);
529 
530  if (rule_data_list == 0) {
531  // es la primera regla q insertamos
532  rule_data->next = rule_data_list;
533  rule_data_list = rule_data;
534  } else {
535  RuleData *aux = rule_data_list;
536  while (aux->next != 0) {
537  aux = aux->next;
538  }
539  rule_data->next = 0;
540  aux->next = rule_data;
541  }
542 }
543 
544 void MOFSModel::initRulestore() {
545  RuleNode* aux_rulestore = rule_store;
546  while (aux_rulestore!= 0) {
547  aux_rulestore->rule->init();
548  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
549  }
550 }

552 void MOFSModel::SaveWeightStats() {
553 
554  A_rules_S = fopen("A_rules_S.txt","a+");
555  B_rules_S = fopen("B_rules_S.txt","a+");
556  C_rules_S = fopen("C_rules_S.txt","a+");
557  D_rules_S = fopen("D_rules_S.txt","a+");
558  A_rules_N = fopen("A_rules_N.txt","a+");
559  B_rules_N = fopen("B_rules_N.txt","a+");
560  C_rules_N = fopen("C_rules_N.txt","a+");
561  D_rules_N = fopen("D_rules_N.txt","a+");
562  RuleNode* aux_rulestore = rule_store;
563 
564  float sum = 0.0;
565  float counter_sum = 0.0;
566  if (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'A') {
567  //orden alfabetico
568 // cout << "'A'" << endl;
569  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'A') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() <= 'G')){
570  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
571  counter_sum += 1.0;
572  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
573  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input1() == 'A') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() == 'A')) {
574  //solventa error que se produce al grabar reglas en fichero con repeticion de regla AAA
575  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
576  }
577  }
578  fprintf(A_rules_S,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
579  sum = 0.0;
580  counter_sum = 0.0;
581  while (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'A') {
582  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
583  counter_sum += 1.0;
584  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
585  }
586 // cout << "ANorte-> sum: " << sum <<" , counter: " << counter_sum << endl;
587  fprintf(A_rules_N,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
588  sum = 0.0;
589  counter_sum = 0.0;
590  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'B') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() <= 'G')){
591  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
592  counter_sum += 1.0;
593  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
594  }
595  fprintf(B_rules_S,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
596  sum = 0.0;
597  counter_sum = 0.0;
598  cout << "BNorte->" << aux_rulestore->rule->input0() << aux_rulestore->rule->input1() <<aux_rulestore->rule->input2() << endl;
599  while (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'B') {
600  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
601  counter_sum += 1.0;
602  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
603  }
604  cout << "BNorte-> sum: " << sum <<" , counter: " << counter_sum << endl;
605  fprintf(B_rules_N,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
606  sum = 0.0;
607  counter_sum = 0.0;
608  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'C') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() <= 'G')){
609  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
610  counter_sum += 1.0;
611  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
612  }
613  fprintf(C_rules_S,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
614  sum = 0.0;
615  counter_sum = 0.0;
616  while (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'C') {
617  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
618  counter_sum += 1.0;
619  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
620  }
621  fprintf(C_rules_N,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
622  sum = 0.0;
623  counter_sum = 0.0;
624  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'D') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() <= 'G')){
625  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
626  counter_sum ++;
627  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
628  }
629  fprintf(D_rules_S,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
630  sum = 0.0;
631  counter_sum = 0.0;
632  while (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'D') {
633  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
634  counter_sum ++;
635  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
636  }
637  fprintf(D_rules_N,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
638  }else {
639  while (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() != 'D') {
640  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
641  }
642  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'D') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() >= 'H')){
643  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
644  counter_sum ++;
645  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
646  }
647  cout << "DNorte-> sum: " << sum <<" , counter: " << counter_sum << endl;
648  fprintf(D_rules_N,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
649  sum = 0.0;
650  counter_sum = 0.0;
651  while (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'D') {
652  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
653  counter_sum ++;
654  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
655  }
656  cout << "DSur-> sum: " << sum <<" , counter: " << counter_sum << endl;
657  fprintf(D_rules_S,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
658  sum = 0.0;
659  counter_sum = 0.0;
660  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'C') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() >= 'H')) {
661  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
662  counter_sum ++;
663  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
664  }
665  cout << "CNorte-> sum: " << sum <<" , counter: " << counter_sum << endl;
666  fprintf(C_rules_N,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
667  sum = 0.0;
668  counter_sum = 0.0;
669  while (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'C') {
670  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
671  counter_sum ++;
672  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
673  }
674  fprintf(C_rules_S,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
675  sum = 0.0;
676  counter_sum = 0.0;
677  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'B') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() >= 'H')){
678  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
679  counter_sum ++;
680  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
681  }
682  fprintf(B_rules_N,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
683  sum = 0.0;
684  counter_sum = 0.0;
685  while (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'B') {
686  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
687  counter_sum ++;
688  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
689  }
690  fprintf(B_rules_S,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
691  sum = 0.0;
692  counter_sum = 0.0;
693  while ((aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'A') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() >= 'H')){
694  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
695  counter_sum ++;
696  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
697  }
698  fprintf(A_rules_N,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
699  sum = 0.0;
700  counter_sum = 0.0;
701  while ((aux_rulestore != 0) && (aux_rulestore->rule->input0() == 'A')) {
702  sum += aux_rulestore->rule->Weight();
703  counter_sum ++;
704  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
705  while ((aux_rulestore != 0) && (aux_rulestore->rule->input1() == 'A') && (aux_rulestore->rule->input2() == 'A')) {
706  //solventa error que se produce al grabar reglas en fichero con repeticion de regla AAA
707  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
708  }
709  }
710  fprintf(A_rules_S,"%f\n",(sum/counter_sum));
711  }
712 
713  fclose(A_rules_N);
714  fclose(B_rules_N);
715  fclose(C_rules_N);
716  fclose(D_rules_N);
717  fclose(A_rules_S);
718  fclose(B_rules_S);
719  fclose(C_rules_S);
720  fclose(D_rules_S);
721 
722 }
723 
724 /*sistema de aprendizaje tutorizado*/
725 
726 
738 float MOFSModel::Action(float* _output) {
739  fuzzy_output_vars->var->calc_values(defuzz_method->defuzz(rule_data_list,num_inputs));
740 
741  // Ahora se conoce el valor float del movimiento del robot, a continuaci�n
742  // se chequear� si este valor es correcto en funci�n de su valor fuzzy
743  // con todas las reglas anteriormente seleccionadas y se realizar� una
744  // actualizaci�n de los pesos en funci�n de acierto de sus resultados
745  // en caso de no encontrar ninguna regla acertada se actualizar� la salida
746  // de una o varias reglas
747  //return fuzzy_output_vars->var.xValue();
748  float output = fuzzy_output_vars->var->xValue();
749  float user_output = checkOutput(_output);
750 
751 // error_out = fopen("errorPrueba.txt","w");
752 // printf("fichero_abierto");
753 // fprintf(error_out,"%f\n",(output - user_output));
754 // printf("escribiendo fichero");
755 // fclose(error_out);
756  //SaveWeightStats();
757  if (user_output != output) {
758  return user_output;
759  }
760  return output;
761 }
762 
772 float MOFSModel::checkOutput(float* _output) {
773  // se comprueba si el valor obtenido con las reglas es razonable
774  // si no lo es se cambiar� por el centro del conjunto seleccionado
775  // por el usuario
776  char user_set_option; // variable donde guardaremos la entrada por teclado de la opcion del usuario
777  float user_value_option;
778  float correct_output = fuzzy_output_vars->var->xValue();
779  //cout << fuzzy_output_vars->var->xValue();
780  if (mode == 0) {
781  cout << " ->si no es correcto introduzca el conjunto adecuado (en otro caso introduzca 'Z'): ";
782  cin >> user_set_option;
783  if ((user_set_option >= 'A') && (user_set_option < fuzzy_output_vars->var->setIndex())) { // No es enter
784  // el usuario ha introducido una opcion mejor
785  correct_output = fuzzy_output_vars->var->center(user_set_option);
786  fuzzy_output_vars->var->calc_values(correct_output);
787  // se modifica el valor de la salida
788  fuzzy_output_vars->var->calc_values(correct_output);
789  // modificada la salida ahora se llama al proceso de actualizaci�n de reglas
790  }
791  } else if (mode == 1) {
792  user_value_option = *_output;
793  if ((user_value_option >= fuzzy_output_vars->var->minX()) && (user_value_option <= fuzzy_output_vars->var->maxX())) {
794  fuzzy_output_vars->var->calc_values(user_value_option);
795  correct_output = user_value_option;
796  }else {
797  correct_output = *_output;
798  }
799  } else if (mode == 2) {
800  // cout << correct_output << endl;
801  }
802 // error_out << *_output - correct_output << endl;
803  if (mode != 2) {
804  updateRules();
805  }
806 
807  return correct_output;
808  // Manda la salida al simulador para que realice la accion adecuada
809 }
810 
811 
822 void MOFSModel::updateRules() {
823  // chequea todas las reglas seleccionadas y actualiza los pesos y si el peso es 0.0 entonces
824  // cambia la salida
825 
826  // se supone que encontrar� las reglas seleccionadas en orden
827 
828  // hacer inversa de la lista de cromosomas
829 
830  char* sets_array;
831  float* y_array;
832  int Acounter = 0;
833  int Bcounter = 0;
834  int Ccounter = 0;
835  int Dcounter = 0;
836 
837  char user_option = fuzzy_output_vars->var->centerSet();
838  RuleData* aux_rule_data_list = rule_data_list;
839  RuleNode* aux_rulestore = rule_store;
840 // int overlap_index = fuzzy_output_vars->var->overlapIndex();
841 
842 // cout << "overlap index = " << overlap_index << endl;
843 
844  sets_array = new char[2];
845  y_array = new float[2];
846 // cout << " sizeof(sets_array) : " << sizeof(sets_array) << endl;
847  fuzzy_output_vars->var->SetsArray(sets_array);
848  fuzzy_output_vars->var->Outputs(y_array);
849 // cout << " sizeof(sets_array) : " << sizeof(sets_array) << endl;
850  for (int i = 0;i<2;i++) {
851  //cout << sets_array[i] << " ----> " << y_array[i] << endl;
852  }
853 // cin.get();
854 
855  while ((aux_rule_data_list != 0) &&(aux_rulestore != 0)) {
856  if (aux_rulestore->rule->updateWeight(aux_rule_data_list->inputs_sets,sets_array,y_array, num_inputs) == 1) {
857  // la regla ha sido modificada
858  //cout << aux_rulestore->rule->Weight() << endl;
859  if (aux_rulestore->rule->Weight() <= 0.0) {
860  aux_rulestore->rule->updateOutput(user_option);
861  }
862  aux_rule_data_list = aux_rule_data_list->next;
863  }
864 // cout << "regla no actualizada" << endl;
865  aux_rulestore = aux_rulestore->next;
866  }
867 
868  delete(sets_array);
869  delete(y_array);
870 }

873 void MOFSModel::showVars() {
874  VarsNode *aux_vars = fuzzy_input_vars;
875  int counter = 1;
876  while (aux_vars != 0) {
877  cout << "variable num " << counter <<endl;
878  // char name[20];aux_vars->var->varName(name);
879  // cout << name << endl;
880  //cout << aux_vars->var->VName() << endl;
881  cout << aux_vars->var->maxX() << endl;
882  cout << aux_vars->var->minX() << endl;
883  cout << aux_vars->var->crispIndex() << endl;
884 // cout << aux_vars->var->overlapIndex() << endl;
885 
886  aux_vars = aux_vars->next;
887  counter++;
888  }
889 
890  aux_vars = fuzzy_output_vars;
891 // char name[20];aux_vars->var->varName(name);
892 // cout << name << endl;
893  //cout << aux_vars->var->VName() << endl;
894  cout << aux_vars->var->maxX() << endl;
895  cout << aux_vars->var->minX() << endl;
896  cout << aux_vars->var->crispIndex() << endl;
897 // cout << aux_vars->var->overlapIndex() << endl;
898  cout << endl << endl << "pulse una tecla para continuar" << endl;
899 // cin.get();
900 }

902 void MOFSModel:: saveModel(char *file) {
903  FILE* file_out;
904  file_out = fopen(file,"w");
905  FILE* save_statistics;
906 // save_statistics = fopen("Statistics.txt","w");
907  if (!file_out) {
908  cout << " Error al salvar los datos del modelo fuzzy";
909  }else{
910  VarsNode *aux_vars = fuzzy_input_vars;
911  fprintf(file_out,"%d\n\n",num_vars);
912  while (aux_vars != 0) {
913  // char *name;aux_vars->var->varName(name);
914  fprintf(file_out,"I\n");
915  char nombre[20];
916  aux_vars->var->VName(nombre);
917  //fprintf("name: %s\n",nombre);
918  fprintf(file_out,"var\n");
919  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_vars->var->maxX());
920  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_vars->var->minX());
921  fprintf(file_out,"%.0f\n",aux_vars->var->crispIndex());
922  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_vars->var->maxCentral());
923  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_vars->var->minCentral());
924  fprintf(file_out,"%.0f\n",aux_vars->var->crispCentral());
925 
926  aux_vars = aux_vars->next;
927  }
928 
929  aux_vars = fuzzy_output_vars;
930  fprintf(file_out,"O\n");
931  //aux_vars->var->VName(nombre);
932  fprintf(file_out,"var_output\n");
933  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_vars->var->maxX());
934  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_vars->var->minX());
935  fprintf(file_out,"%.0f\n",aux_vars->var->crispIndex());
936  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_vars->var->maxCentral());
937  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_vars->var->minCentral());
938  fprintf(file_out,"%.0f\n",aux_vars->var->crispCentral());
939 
940 
941  RuleNode *aux_rules = rule_store;
942  char *ipts;
943  ipts = new char[num_inputs];
944  while (aux_rules != 0) {
945  // printf(" inputs ");
946  aux_rules->rule->inputs_array(ipts);
947  for (int i =0;i<num_inputs;i++) {
948  // printf("%c.",ipts[i]);
949  fprintf(file_out,"%c",ipts[i]);
950  // fprintf(save_statistics,"%c",ipts[i]);
951  }
952  fprintf(file_out,"\n");
953  // char * inputs;aux_rules->rule->inputs_array(inputs);
954  // file_out << inputs << endl;
955  fprintf(file_out,"%c\n",aux_rules->rule->outputValue());
956  // fprintf(save_statistics,"%c Peso: ", aux_rules->rule->outputValue());
957  fprintf(file_out,"%.2f\n",aux_rules->rule->Weight());
958  // fprintf(save_statistics,"%f --> %d\n",aux_rules->rule->Weight(), aux_rules->rule->BitAct());
959  aux_rules = aux_rules->next;
960  }
961  fclose(file_out);
962  delete(ipts);
963  // fclose(var1);
964  cout << "datos guardados con exito. Pulse una tecla";
965  cin.get();
966  }
967 /* pesos.close();
968  error_out.close();
969  vars_out.close();*/
970  cin.get();
971  //MOFSModel::~MOFSModel();
972 }
